title: Requires the surfaces of non-commercial vehicles to be cleared of accumulated snow, sleet or hail
summary: Requires the surfaces of non-commercial vehicles to be cleared of accumulated snow, sleet or hail; exempts any automobile transporter, motorcycle or authorized emergency vehicle; imposes fines.

   13  PROVISIONS  OF  THIS  SECTION,  EXCLUDING  A DISABLED OPERATOR, SHALL BE

   23  SECTION WHERE SUCH VIOLATION RESULTS IN THE SERIOUS PHYSICAL  INJURY  OF
